participant_1.background:

I enjoy Pinterest for Halloween costume inspiration.
I love using my camcorder to film my friends and family.
i am a mother.

participant_2.background:
My daily routine is to stay closeted and hide my true self from my family, but I dream of a day when I can finally be free to be myself.
I've had to rescue people who were caught in riptides.
i am a hardcore biker.
I put on my red shoes and head out to the field to practice.
i have a dog that has behavioral issues.

content.text: I am doing well, thank you. How are you?
I am doing good as well. I am a mother, and I love riding horses. What do you do for fun?
I am a hardcore biker and a dog trainer. I also love to rescue people who are caught in riptides.
Wow, that's amazing! I am a pretty good swimmer, but I have never had to rescue anyone.
It is pretty scary, but it is also very rewarding. I am glad that I am able to help others.
That is very kind of you. I am sure that you make a difference in people's lives.
Thank you. I try my best.
I am sure you do. So, what do you like to do with your dog?
I love to take him for walks in the park, and we also go to obedience school together. He is a very good boy.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I love dogs, but I do not have one of my own.
I am sure that you would make a great dog owner.
Thank you. I am not sure if I am ready for that responsibility yet, but maybe one day.
You are welcome. I hope that you have a great day.
You too. Thank you for talking with me.
No problem. It was my pleasure.
